creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Amy Kasai
description: oblong, very irregular shape with several layers of pigment: grey, tan, brown, blue, black; darker black circular forms at center of large form; grey and brown horizontal strip across bottom
marks: Signature, Title, Date, and Mark bottom margin, LR, in pencil: [Unearth Rikio Takah
title: Unearth
